display_long_description:
# Supermarket Update—Out Now!
Brawl while you shop in a chaotic Supermarket Map with frozen fish, shopping carts, and milk jugs! And try a new Creative Mode where you can take a break from fighting and build non-stop!
[media]
# Early Access Available Now!
Fight with the power of imagination, where everything can be a weapon!
Build Brawlers is a new free-to-play, multiplayer VR all-out brawler where the environment itself becomes your armory! Enjoy playing with your friends as you grab street signs, tires, basketballs, soda bottles, and other everyday objects. Combine them by sticking them together to build your own chaotic weapon on the spot!

[media]
# Build your own weapon!
Grab → Stick → Swing! Combine everyday objects to build powerful (and hilarious) weapons. Your creativity wins.

[media]
# Team up! (Friend invites & random matchmaking available)
An all-out free-for-all where up to six players collide! Experience wild, unpredictable action.
Score a KO to claim the coveted gold crown. But watch out, because everyone’s next target is you!

[media]
# There are no limits—only imagination.
Build → Test → Rebuild! Freely experiment with everyday objects.
It’s not just about winning. Playing with friends and experimenting with physics in VR is all part of the fun!

Regular updates, cosmetics, and events keep the chaos going!
Join our Discord server（discord.gg/univrs）and enjoy the game together!
This game is in Early Access. We’re developing Build Brawlers with the community's help. Your feedback, thoughts, and requests are welcome!

Fight with the power of imagination, where everything can be a weapon!
Build Brawlers is a new free-to-play, multiplayer VR all-out brawler where the environment itself becomes your armory! Enjoy playing with your friends as you grab street signs, tires, basketballs, soda bottles, and other everyday objects.
